post.author: 권칠환
post.content:
CORE Services Inc. is a premier provider of Permanent, Contract and Temporary Recruitment and Staffing solutions.  We partner with industry leading organizations in developing and implementing strategic solutions to fulfill their employment vacancies.  We thank all applicants for their interest, however only applicable candidates will be contacted directly.



Location:         Scarborough , On

Position:         PHP Developer (Full time – Permanent)

Salary:           $50,000 - $58,000 per annum

Responsibilities:

•Developing programming code from scratch or by adapting existing website graphics and software to meet business requirements•Uploading the website to servers•Testing the website and identifying any technical problems and glitches•Determining any functionality that the website must support and developing content based on practical approved layout•Website maintenance / Database design•Database entry

Position Overview:

•3-5 years with HTML/CSS/Javascript
•3-5 years with Object-Oriented Programming (must have)
•3-5 years experience with PHP 5/MySQL 5 (must have)
•Zend Framework, PEAR Framework
•Knowledge of jQuery, AJAX, Doctrine, PHPUnit, phpDocumentor, Unified Modeling Language (UML), PHP Design Patterns, Concurrent Versions System (CVS)
•Smarty template
•Proficient with Structured Query Language
•Familiar with Eclipse IDE
•Illustrator/Photoshop/PageMaker/Acrobat Professional



If you or someone you may know with the necessary background is interested, please send resume to:


applicant@coreservicesinc.com

  

                      

Recruitment Team

CORE Services Inc.

coreservicesinc.com
post.title: PHP Developer (Full time – Permanent)
